title: New: Lason – Loathe You
body:
Rolling piano sections and barely audible vocals make up the majority of Italian musician Lason’s debut track, Loathe You.

Remorseful, despairing and slightly haunting, the minimal approach and singular directive is comparable to that of Jamie Isaac, or even Manchester hype band MONEY, however coming in at five and a half minutes, it’s more of an experience than simply a song. Check it out below.
